availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Morrow Smith and Elizabeth Smith. Married to Sarah Routon Smith in Lincoln County, Kentucky, on January 25, 1858. Father of Monroe T. Smith, Sarah B. Smith, and James W. Smith. Resident in Lincoln County in 1850. Farmer in Lincoln County in 1860. Killed Robert Raines in Lincoln County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District 1, p. 252B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 141.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Highland, p. 29A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lincoln County Marriages, Film #001904136, p. 44.
